snippet: The Republican Party must become a bigger coalition that welcomes diverse ideas to win national elections, Sen. Rand Paul said Saturday at the Maine Republican Party convention....

headline.print_headline: In Maine, Rand Paul Says GOP Must Grow to Win
headline.main: In Maine, Rand Paul Says GOP Must Grow to Win

lead_paragraph: The Republican Party must become a bigger coalition that welcomes diverse ideas to win national elections, Sen. Rand Paul said Saturday at the Maine Republican Party convention.
